text: Lol how weird, I'm playing Radiant Historia as well and have seen a few other comments talking about it. Hopefully that game is trending, awesome title. Especially since I read on IGN that this year has been the most sluggish in sales since 2006. Anyway back on point, I've been a big fan of AA's music since the first one. Has such a strong focus on melody and mood. Each piece perfectly fits whatever is going on screen.

text:
I disagree with that.

First case is like others, just a intro, the 2nd case SUCK (look the 2nd case in phoenic wright 1 or 2, it's just sooooo better), only the third case is really good, the 4th...oh yeah, we already know what's happening, it's a flashback, look phoenix wright 1 case, or even better, the second one ?).

And the last case is just TOO LONG (and boring with all this mystic stuff and ghosts).

Trials and tribulations is only good because of the procuror, that's all.
